43 template <class T>
44 void cloudMean<T>::meanFilter(pcl::PointCloud<T> &res, int width, int height){
45  if(cloudQueue.isEmpty()) return;
46  std::vector<float> conf(width*height, 0);
47  std::vector<float> mnCounter(width*height, 0);
48  std::vector<float> addX(width*height, 0);
49  std::vector<float> addY(width*height, 0);
50  std::vector<float> addZ(width*height, 0);
51  std::vector<float> ampt(width*height, 0);
52  //Point_Cloud sum;
53  PointCloud tempToFilter;
54  PointCloud tempC;
55  res.width = width;
56  res.height = height;
57  while (!cloudQueue.isEmpty()){
58  cloudQueue.dequeue(tempC);
59  //Filter Implementation
60  //this->voxelGrid(tempToFilter, tempC);
61  int i = 0;
62  for(int i = 0; i < tempC.points.size(); i++){
63  if(!std::isnan(tempC.points[i].x)){
64  addX[i] += tempC.points[i].x;
65  addY[i] += tempC.points[i].y;
66  addZ[i] += tempC.points[i].z;
67  ampt[i] += tempC.points[i].intensity;
68  mnCounter[i] +=1;
69  // ROS_INFO("X: %f, Y: %f, Z:%f AMP: %f, Mean Counter: %d", addX[i], addY[i], addZ[i], ampt[i], mnCounter[i]);
70  }else{
71  conf[i] = 1;
72  mnCounter[i] = 0;
73  }
74  }
75  }
76  for(int i = 0; i < mnCounter.size(); i++){
77  pcl::PointXYZI temPoint;
78  if(mnCounter[i] == 0){
79  temPoint.x = NAN;
80  temPoint.y = NAN;
81  temPoint.z = NAN;
82  temPoint.intensity = NAN;
83  }else{
84  temPoint.x = addX[i] / mnCounter[i];
85  temPoint.y = addY[i] / mnCounter[i];
86  temPoint.z = addZ[i] / mnCounter[i];
87  temPoint.intensity = ampt[i] / mnCounter[i];
88  }
89  res.points.push_back(temPoint);
90  }
91 }
92 
93 #endif
